snippet: The authorities closed 22 kilometers of beaches along the east coast to the public on Thursday as hundreds of workers began cleaning up debris and oil spilled from a stranded cargo ship.
lead_paragraph: The authorities closed 22 kilometers of beaches along the east coast to the public on Thursday as hundreds of workers began cleaning up debris and oil spilled from a stranded cargo ship.

headline.main: Spill Cleanup Closes New Zealand Beaches
headline.print_headline: New Zealand: Oil Spill Is Nation’s Worst
